title: Ocean's Twelve
des: Daniel Ocean recruits one more team member so he can pull off three major European heists in this sequel to Ocean's 11.

title: The Rescuers Down Under
des: The R.A.S. agents, Miss Bianca and Bernard, race to Australia to save a little boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.

title: The Vanishing
des: Three lighthouse keepers on the remote Flannan Isles find a hidden trunk of gold, leading to their mysterious disappearance.

title: EastEnders
des: The everyday lives of working-class inhabitants of Albert Square, a traditional Victorian square of terrace houses surrounding a park in the East End of London's Walford borough. The square includes the Queen Vic pub and a street market.

title: R.I.P.D.
des: A recently slain cop joins a team of undead police officers working for the Rest in Peace Department and tries to find the man who murdered him.

title: Miss Bala
des: Gloria finds a power she never knew she had when she is drawn into a dangerous world of cross-border crime. Surviving will require all of her cunning, inventiveness, and strength. Based on the Spanish-language film.

title: Grantchester
des: A Cambridgeshire clergyman finds himself investigating a series of mysterious wrongdoings in his small village of Grantchester.

title: Gangster Squad
des: It's 1949 Los Angeles, the city is run by gangsters and a malicious mobster, Mickey Cohen. Determined to end the corruption, John O'Mara assembles a team of cops, ready to take down the ruthless leader and restore peace to the city.

title: Solace
des: Psychic John Clancy (Sir Anthony Hopkins) works with the F.B.I. in order to hunt down a serial killer.

title: Bad Blood
des: A dramatization of the life and death of Montreal mob boss Vito Rizzuto.

title: Instinct
des: A former CIA operative (Cumming), who has since built a "normal" life as a gifted professor and writer, is pulled back into his old life when the NYPD needs his help to stop a serial killer on the loose.

title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
des: A teenager becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.

title: Wanted
des: A frustrated office worker learns that he is the son of a professional assassin and that he shares his father's superhuman killing abilities.

title: The Closer
des: Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive cases.

title: Burn Notice
des: A spy recently disavowed by the U.S. government uses his special ops training to help others in trouble.

title: CSI: NY
des: CSI head Detective Mac Taylor and his team solve crimes in New York City.

title: Suburbicon
des: As a 1950s suburban community self-destructs, a home invasion has sinister consequences for one seemingly normal family.

title: Sleepers
des: After a prank goes disastrously wrong, a group of boys are sent to a detention center where they are brutalized. Thirteen years later, they get their chance for revenge.

title: Austin Powers in Goldmember
des: Upon learning that his father has been kidnapped, Austin Powers must travel to 1975 and defeat the aptly named villain Goldmember, who is working with Dr. Evil.

title: The Tax Collector
des: The full plot is currently unknown, but it's been billed as a gritty urban street crime drama.

title: U.S. Marshals
des: U.S. Marshal Samuel Gerard and his team of Marshals are assigned to track down Sheridan, who has been accused of a double-murder.

title: Collateral
des: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles.

title: Collateral
des: London detectives investigating the seemingly random murder of a pizza delivery man uncover a convoluted case of interlocking circumstances amid a cross-section of British society.

title: Bloodline
des: Evan values family above all else, and anyone who gets between him, his wife, and newborn son learns that the hard way. But when it comes to violent tendencies, it seems the apple doesn't fall far from the tree.

title: Tin Star
des: Ex undercover UK cop turned police chief of a small town in the Canadian Rockies does what he must to defend his family from those in power whether it's the oilmen, the preachers or the gangsters.

title: Border
des: A customs officer who can smell fear develops an unusual attraction to a strange traveler while aiding a police investigation which will call into question her entire existence.

title: The Fugitive
des: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.

title: Inspector Lewis
des: Inspector Robert Lewis and Sergeant James Hathaway solve the tough cases that the learned inhabitants of Oxford throw at them.

title: Ocean's Thirteen
des: Danny Ocean rounds up the boys for a third heist, after casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses one of the original eleven, Reuben Tishkoff.

title: Black Mass
des: The true story of Whitey Bulger, the brother of a state senator and the most infamous violent criminal in the history of South Boston, who became an FBI informant to take down a Mafia family invading his turf.

title: Wild Things
des: A police detective uncovers a conspiracy behind a case involving a high-school guidance counselor when accusations of rape are made against him by two female students.

title: Shot Caller
des: A newly released prisoner is forced by the leaders of his gang to orchestrate a major crime with a brutal rival gang on the streets of Southern California.

title: Side Effects
des: A young woman's world unravels when a drug prescribed by her psychiatrist has unexpected side effects.

title: Face/Off
des: In order to foil a terrorist plot, an FBI agent undergoes a facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a terrorist, but the plan turns from bad to worse when the same terrorist impersonates the FBI agent.

title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
des: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.

title: The Woman in the Window
des: An agoraphobic woman living alone in New York begins spying on her new neighbors only to witness a disturbing act of violence.

title: Enter the Dragon
des: A martial artist agrees to spy on a reclusive crime lord using his invitation to a tournament there as cover.

title: Hinterland
des: A noir crime drama set in Aberystwyth, Wales, where troubled DCI Tom Mathias solves murders while searching for redemption.

title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
des: Detective Sherlock Holmes is on the trail of criminal mastermind Professor Moriarty, who is carrying out a string of random crimes across Europe.

title: The Traitor
des: The real life of Tommaso Buscetta the so called "boss of the two worlds", first mafia informant in Sicily 1980's.

title: Kindergarten Cop
des: A tough cop must pose as a kindergarten teacher in order to locate a dangerous criminal's ex-wife, who may hold the key to putting him behind bars.

title: Clear and Present Danger
des: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

title: Serpico
des: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

title: I, Robot
des: In 2035, a technophobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot, which leads to a larger threat to humanity.

title: Numb3rs
des: Working for the F.B.I., a mathematician uses equations to help solve various crimes.

title: The Whole Nine Yards
des: A struggling dentist's life is turned upside down when a famous gangster moves in next door, and his wife convinces him to inform a notorious mob boss about the gangster's whereabouts.

title: The Happytime Murders
des: When the puppet cast of a '90s children's TV show begin to get murdered one by one, a disgraced LAPD detective-turned-private eye puppet takes on the case.

title: Beverly Hills Cop

title: Seven Psychopaths
des: A struggling screenwriter inadvertently becomes entangled in the Los Angeles criminal underworld after his oddball friends kidnap a gangster's beloved Shih Tzu.
"21" is the fact-based story about six MIT students who were trained to become experts in card counting and subsequently took Vegas casinos for millions in winnings.

title: The Clovehitch Killer
des: A picture-perfect family is shattered when the work of a serial killer hits too close to home. Dylan McDermott stars in this chilling portrait of all-American evil.

title: Kick-Ass 2
des: Following Kick-Ass' heroics, other citizens are inspired to become masked crusaders. But Red Mist leads his own group of evil supervillains to get revenge, kill Kick-Ass and destroy everything he stands for.

des: A young man named Brandon Teena navigates love, life, and being transgender in rural Nebraska.

title: Chappie
des: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force. When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself.

des: The Sheriff of a suburban New Jersey community, populated by New York City police officers, slowly discovers the town is a front for mob connections and corruption.

title: Grand Hotel
des: A look at the professional and personal lives of people working at a family-run hotel in Miami Beach.

title: The American
des: An assassin hides out in Italy for one last assignment.

title: The November Man
des: An ex-C.I.A. operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level C.I.A. officials and the Russian President-elect.

title: Lie to Me
des: About Cal Lightman, the world's leading deception expert who studies facial expressions and involuntary body language to expose the truth behind the lies.

title: The Italian Job
des: After being betrayed and left for dead in Italy, Charlie Croker and his team plan an elaborate gold heist against their former ally.

des: Inspector John Marlott investigates a series of crimes in 19th Century London, which may have been committed by a scientist intent on re-animating the dead.

title: The Bill
des: Uniform officers and detectives from an inner London police station enforce law and order on a day to day basis.

title: Layer Cake
des: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.

title: Public Enemies
des: The Feds try to take down notorious American gangsters John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson and Pretty Boy Floyd during a booming crime wave in the 1930s.

title: Lethal Weapon
des: Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers.

title: The Life of David Gale
des: A man against capital punishment is accused of murdering a fellow activist and is sent to death row.

title: Dear Zachary: A Letter to a Son About His Father
des: A filmmaker decides to memorialize a murdered friend when his friend's ex-girlfriend announces she is expecting his son.

title: Blindspotting
des: While on probation, a man begins to re-evaluate his relationship with his volatile best friend.

title: Bound
des: Corky, a tough female ex con and her lover Violet concoct a scheme to steal millions of stashed mob money and pin the blame on Violet's crooked boyfriend Caesar.

des: An ex-enforcer for a local crime syndicate has vowed to enact retribution on his mob bosses after 19 years of wrongful imprisonment. The only thing diverting his violent plans is a new found relationship to his beloved son.

title: Alias Grace
des: In 19th-century Canada, a psychiatrist weighs whether a murderess should be pardoned due to insanity.

title: Witness
des: When a young Amish boy is sole witness to a murder, policeman John Book goes into hiding in Amish country to protect him until the trial.

title: Burn After Reading
des: A disk containing mysterious information from a CIA agent ends up in the hands of two unscrupulous and daft gym employees who attempt to sell it.

title: The Sting
des: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

title: Above Suspicion
des: The story that lead to the first ever conviction for murder of an FBI agent.

title: Gone in 60 Seconds
des: A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal fifty cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life.

title: Free Fire

title: Rizzoli & Isles
des: Detective Jane Rizzoli and Chief Medical Examiner Dr. Maura Isles team up to solve crimes in Boston.

title: Lying and Stealing
des: Ivan steals art for the Greek. He wants out but can he? He meets an actress at 2 of his "jobs". She has her own problems but helps him.

title: Miss Fisher's Murder Mysteries
des: A female sleuth sashays through the back lanes and jazz clubs of Melbourne in the late 1920s, fighting injustice with her pearl-handled pistol and her dagger-sharp wit.

title: Dark Crimes
des: A murder investigation of a slain businessman turns to clues found in an author's book about an eerily similar crime. Based on the 2008 article "True Crimes - A Postmodern Murder Mystery" by David Grann.

title: Wisting
des: Empathetic, meticulous and relentless - the only thing to escape Larvik detective William Wisting in his hunt for Norway's most notorious criminals is a happy family life. And when two ...                See full summary »

title: Falling Down
des: An unemployed defense worker frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

title: This Gun for Hire
des: When assassin Philip Raven shoots a blackmailer and his beautiful female companion dead, he is paid off in marked bills by his treasonous employer who is working with foreign spies.

title: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer
des: Jean-Baptiste Grenouille (Ben Whishaw), born with a superior olfactory sense, creates the world's finest perfume. His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent.

title: Fonzo
des: The 47-year old Al Capone, after 10 years in prison, starts suffering from dementia, and comes to be haunted by his violent past.

title: London Fields
des: Clairvoyant femme fatale Nicola Six has been living with a dark premonition of her impending death by murder. She begins a tangled love affair with three uniquely different men: one of whom she knows will be her murderer.

title: Inspector Gadget
des: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer.

title: Rush Hour
des: A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed L.A.P.D. detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.

title: Assassination Nation
des: After a malicious data hack exposes the secrets of the perpetually American town of Salem, chaos descents and four girls must fight to survive, while coping with the hack themselves.

des: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

title: A History of Violence
des: A mild-mannered man becomes a local hero through an act of violence, which sets off repercussions that will shake his family to its very core in this action thriller.

title: Without Remorse
des: John Kelly, a Navy SEAL, goes on a path to avenge his wife's murder only to find himself inside of a larger conspiracy.

title: True Story
des: When disgraced New York Times reporter Michael Finkel meets accused killer Christian Longo - who has taken on Finkel's identity - his investigation morphs into a game of cat-and-mouse.

title: The Girl Next Door
des: Based on the Jack Ketchum novel of the same name, The Girl Next Door follows the unspeakable torture and abuses committed on a teenage girl in the care of her aunt...and the boys who witness and fail to report the crime.

des: A look at the formative years of New Jersey gangster, Tony Soprano.

title: State of Play
des: When a congressional aide is killed, a Washington D.C. journalist starts investigating the case involving the congressman, his old college friend.

des: A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witnesses his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.

title: Demolition Man
des: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

des: A rookie officer is teamed with a hardened pro at the California Highway Patrol, though the newbie soon learns his partner is really an undercover Fed investigating a heist that may involve some crooked cops.

title: Bronson
des: A young man who was sentenced to seven years in prison for robbing a post office ends up spending three decades in solitary confinement. During this time, his own personality is supplanted by his alter-ego, Charles Bronson.

title: Anon
des: In a world without anonymity or crime, a detective meets a woman who threatens their security.

title: Nikita
des: A rogue assassin returns to take down the secret organization that trained her.

title: Eastern Promises
des: A Russian teenager living in London who dies during childbirth leaves clues to a midwife in her journal that could tie her child to a rape involving a violent Russian mob family.

des: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

title: C.B. Strike
des: War veteran turned private detective Cormoran Strike solves brutal murders with the help of his trusted assistant Robin Ellacott.

title: Hawkeye
des: Series based on the Marvel Comics superhero Hawkeye, centering on the adventures of Young Avenger, Kate Bishop, who took on the role after the original Avenger, Clint Barton.

title: Escape at Dannemora
des: An employee at a prison in upstate New York becomes romantically involved with a pair of inmates and helps them escape.

title: The Missing

title: Beauty and the Beast
des: The adventures and romance of a sensitive and cultured lion-man and a crusading assistant district attorney in Manhattan, New York City.

title: The Borgias
des: In the fifteenth century, Pope Alexander VI tries to control all power in Italy with the help of his several sons, through murder, intrigue, war, and marriage alliances.

title: Ripper Street

title: The Following
des: A brilliant and charismatic, yet psychotic serial killer communicates with other active serial killers and activates a cult of believers following his every command.

title: Foyle's War
des: As WWII rages, DCS Foyle fights his own war on the home-front; investigating crime on the south coast of England. Later series, see the retired detective working as an MI5 agent in the aftermath of the war.

title: Heartbeat
des: The 1960s lives and adventures of the police constabulary, medical staff, and residents of Ashfordly and Aidensfield.

title: RocknRolla
des: In London, a real-estate scam puts millions of pounds up for grabs, attracting some of the city's scrappiest tough guys and its more established underworld types, all of whom are looking to get rich quick. See full summary »

title: Without a Trace
des: The cases of an FBI unit specializing in missing persons investigations.

title: From Dusk Till Dawn: The Series
des: A Texas Ranger is in hot pursuit of the infamous Gecko brothers and their hostages. They all end up trapped in a desert bar secretly run by vampires and discover a vampire conspiracy.

title: Walking Tall
des: A former U.S. soldier returns to his hometown to find it overrun by crime and corruption, which prompts him to clean house.

title: Jack Taylor
des: Ex-cop Jack Taylor earns a reputation for being a tough-as-nails private investigator who's not afraid to take on vigilantes or track down killers.

title: The Name of the Rose
des: An intellectually nonconformist friar investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.

des: An aging thief hopes to retire and live off his ill-gotten wealth when a young kid convinces him into doing one last heist.

title: Home Alone 4: Taking Back the House
des: Amidst his parents' impending divorce, Kevin McCallister must foil his old nemesis Marv and his wife Vera's plot to kidnap a Crown Prince despite opposition from his dad Peter, Peter's fiancee Natalie, and Natalie's butler Mr. Prescott.

title: The Family
des: The Manzoni family, a notorious mafia clan, is relocated to Normandy, France under the Witness Protection Program, where fitting in soon becomes challenging, as their old habits die hard.

title: Bad Santa 2
des: Fueled by cheap whiskey, greed and hatred, Willie teams up once again with his angry little sidekick, Marcus, to knock off a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve.

title: Lucky Number Slevin
des: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses: The Rabbi and The Boss. Slevin is under constant surveillance by relentless Detective Brikowski as well as the infamous assassin Goodkat and finds himself having to hatch his own ingenious plot to get them before they get him.

title: Age Out
des: Fresh out of foster care at age 18, a young drifter turns to petty crime to survive, and discovers an impossible love in an unlikely friend.

title: Judge Dredd
des: In a dystopian future, Joseph Dredd, the most famous Judge (a police officer with instant field judiciary powers), is convicted for a crime he did not commit and must face his murderous counterpart.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
des: In Night City, a mercenary known as V navigates a dystopian society in which the line between humanity and technology becomes blurred.

title: Savages
des: Pot growers Ben and Chon face off against the Mexican drug cartel who kidnapped their shared girlfriend.

title: Regression
des: A detective and a psychoanalyst uncover evidence of a satanic cult while investigating a young woman's terrifying past.

title: Death Wish
des: A New York City architect becomes a one-man vigilante squad after his wife is murdered by street punks in which he randomly goes out and kills would-be muggers on the mean streets after dark.

title: Hitman
des: A gun-for-hire known only as Agent 47 hired by a group known only as 'The Organization' is ensnared in a political conspiracy, which finds him pursued by both Interpol and the Russian military as he treks across Russia and Eastern Europe.

title: Lucky Day
des: Red, a safe cracker who has just been released from prison, is trying to hold his family together as his past catches up with him in the form of Luc, a psychopathic contract killer who's seeking revenge for the death of his brother.

title: Animal Kingdom
des: A seventeen year-old navigates his survival amongst an explosive criminal family and the detective who thinks he can save him.

title: The Bling Ring
des: Inspired by actual events, a group of fame-obsessed teenagers use the internet to track celebrities' whereabouts in order to rob their homes.

title: Making a Murderer
des: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: On the Waterfront
des: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

title: Shaft
des: New York City police detective John Shaft (nephew of the original 1970s detective) goes on a personal mission to make sure the son of a real estate tycoon is brought to justice after a racially-motivated murder.

title: Patriots Day
des: The story of the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing and the aftermath, which includes the city-wide manhunt to find the terrorists responsible.

title: A Vigilante
des: A vigilante helps victims escape their domestic abusers.

title: Taxi
des: A mouthy and feisty taxicab driver has hot tips for a green and inept cop set on solving a string of New York City bank robberies committed by a quartet of female Brazilian bank robbers.

title: Cobra
des: A tough-on-crime street cop must protect the only surviving witness to a strange murderous cult with far-reaching plans.

title: Kin
des: Chased by a vengeful criminal, the feds and a gang of otherworldly soldiers, a recently released ex-con, and his adopted teenage brother are forced to go on the run with a weapon of mysterious origin as their only protection.

title: Money Monster
des: Financial TV host Lee Gates and his producer Patty are put in an extreme situation when an irate investor takes them and their crew as hostage.

title: Hart to Hart
des: The globe-trotting adventures of amateur detectives Jonathan (Robert Wagner) and Jennifer Hart (Stefanie Powers).

title: The Spirit
des: Rookie cop Denny Colt returns from the beyond as The Spirit, a hero whose mission is to fight against the bad forces in Central City.

title: Batman: The Killing Joke
des: As Batman hunts for the escaped Joker, the Clown Prince of Crime attacks the Gordon family to prove a diabolical point mirroring his own fall into madness.

title: Live by Night
des: A group of Boston-bred gangsters set up shop in balmy Florida during the Prohibition era, facing off against the competition and the Ku Klux Klan.

title: Gringo
des: GRINGO, a dark comedy mixed with white-knuckle action and dramatic intrigue, explores the battle of survival for businessman Harold Soyinka (David Oyelowo) when he finds himself crossing the line from law-abiding citizen to wanted criminal.

title: Red Heat
des: A tough Russian policeman is forced to partner up with a cocky Chicago police detective when he is sent to Chicago to apprehend a Georgian drug lord who killed his partner and fled the country.

title: RoboCop 2
des: Cyborg law enforcer RoboCop returns to protect the citizens of old Detroit but faces a deadly challenge when a rogue OCP member secretly creates a new, evil RoboCop 2.

title: The Wrecking Crew
des: Gold bullion worth USD 1 billion has been stolen from a hijacked train in Denmark. The main suspect is Count Massimo Contini. The US government sends Matt Helm, one of its top agents, to investigate and recover the gold.

title: Get Shorty
des: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

title: Damsel
des: It's the Wild West, circa 1870. Samuel Alabaster, an affluent pioneer, ventures across the American frontier to marry the love of his life, Penelope. As his group traverses the west, the once-simple journey grows treacherous, blurring the lines between hero, villain and damsel.

title: The Bone Collector
des: A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his female partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.

title: Bad Lieutenant
des: While investigating a young nun's rape, a corrupt New York City police detective, with a serious drug and gambling addiction, tries to change his ways and find forgiveness and redemption.

title: Be Cool
des: Disenchanted with the movie industry, Chili Palmer tries the music industry, meeting and romancing a widow of a music executive on the way.

title: Green Street Hooligans
des: A wrongfully expelled Harvard undergrad moves to London, where he is introduced to the violent underworld of football hooliganism.

title: The Accused
des: After a young woman suffers a brutal gang rape in a bar one night, a prosecutor assists in bringing the perpetrators to justice, including the ones who encouraged and cheered on the attack.

title: Dope
des: Life changes for Malcolm, a geek who's surviving life in a tough neighborhood, after a chance invitation to an underground party leads him and his friends into a Los Angeles adventure.

title: Imposters
des: A dark comedy that focuses on a female con artist who marries people and then disappears with their money.

title: Money Talks
des: Sought by police and criminals, a small-time huckster makes a deal with a TV newsman for protection.

title: My Life Is Murder
des: Fearless and playful, she acts on instinct; both avenging angel and a bit of a shit stirrer; deeply empathetic and blunt to the point of rudeness. And with a deeply irreverent sense of ...                See full summary »

title: The Jesus Rolls
des: A spin-off of The Big Lebowski centered on the notable bowler, Jesus Quintana.

title: The Staircase
des: The high-profile murder trial of American novelist Michael Peterson following the death of his wife in 2001.

title: Crypto
des: Demoted back to his hometown. A young Wall Street banker is drawn into investigating a tangled web of corruption and fraud in Upstate New York. Affecting both his personal life and business career.

title: Siberia
des: When an American diamond trader's Russian partner goes missing, he journeys to Siberia in search of him, but instead begins a love affair.

title: Snatch
des: A group of up-and-coming hustlers who stumble upon a truck-load of stolen gold bullion are suddenly thrust into the high-stakes world of organized crime.

title: Hawaii Five-O
des: The investigations of Hawaii Five-0, an elite branch of the Hawaii State Police answerable only to the governor and headed by stalwart Steve McGarrett.

title: The Bank Job
des: Martine offers Terry a lead on a foolproof bank hit on London's Baker Street. She targets a roomful of safe deposit boxes worth millions in cash and jewelry. But Terry and his crew don't realize the boxes also contain a treasure trove of dirty secrets - secrets that will thrust them into a deadly web of corruption and illicit scandal.

title: Out of Sight
des: A career bank robber breaks out of jail, and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a U.S. Marshal he has kidnapped.

title: The Long Kiss Goodnight
des: A woman suffering from amnesia begins to recover her memories after trouble from her past finds her again.

title: Snakes on a Plane
des: An F.B.I. Agent takes on a plane full of deadly venomous snakes, deliberately released to kill a witness being flown from Honolulu to Los Angeles to testify against a mob boss.

title: Menace II Society
des: A young street hustler attempts to escape the rigors and temptations of the ghetto in a quest for a better life.

title: No Way Out
des: A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.

title: American Vandal
des: A true-crime satire that explores the aftermath of a costly high school prank that left twenty-seven faculty cars vandalized with phallic images.

title: American Gigolo
des: A Los Angeles male escort, who mostly caters to an older female clientèle, is accused of a murder which he did not commit.

title: It's a Mad Mad Mad Mad World
des: A group of motorists hear about a crook's hidden stash of loot, and race against each other across the country to get to it.

title: Starsky & Hutch
des: Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red and white Ford Gran Torino, with the help of a police snitch called "Huggy Bear".

title: The Taking of Pelham 123
des: Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for dispatcher Walter Garber into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime.

title: Faster
des: An ex-con gets on a series of apparently unrelated killings. He gets tracked by a veteran cop with secrets of his own and an egocentric hit man.

title: The Brothers Bloom
des: The Brothers Bloom are the best con men in the world, swindling millionaires with complex scenarios of lust and intrigue. Now they've decided to take on one last job - showing a beautiful and eccentric heiress the time of her life with a romantic adventure that takes them around the world.

title: Rush Hour 2
des: Carter and Lee head to Hong Kong for a vacation, but become embroiled in a counterfeit money scam.

title: The Preppy Murder: Death in Central Park
des: A definitive look at the notorious 1986 murder of Jennifer Levin in Central Park, featuring exclusive interviews and never-before-seen archival material.

title: A Prayer Before Dawn
des: The true story of an English boxer incarcerated in one of Thailand's most notorious prisons as he fights in Muay Thai tournaments to earn his freedom.

title: Fun with Dick and Jane
des: When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet.

title: Among the Shadows
des: A private investigator must unravel the murder of her uncle while keeping the secret that she is a descendant from a line of werewolves.

title: Catwoman
des: A shy woman, endowed with the speed, reflexes, and senses of a cat, walks a thin line between criminal and hero, even as a detective doggedly pursues her, fascinated by both of her personas.

title: Damnation
des: An epic saga about the secret history of the 1930s American heartland, centering on the mythic conflict and bloody struggle between big money and the downtrodden.

title: The Crying Game
des: A British soldier kidnapped by IRA terrorists soon befriends one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldier's world.

title: The Glass House
des: An orphaned teenager is taken in by a Malibu couple but discovers they aren't the caring friends they seemed to be.

title: Blackhat
des: A furloughed convict and his American and Chinese partners hunt a high-level cybercrime network from Chicago to Los Angeles to Hong Kong to Jakarta.

title: One for the Money
des: Unemployed and newly-divorced Stephanie Plum lands a job at her cousin's bail-bond business, where her first assignment puts her on the trail of a wanted local cop from her romantic past.

title: Going in Style
des: Desperate to pay the bills and come through for their loved ones, three lifelong pals risk it all by embarking on a daring bid to knock off the very bank that absconded with their money.

title: The Team
des: A European joint investigation team investigates organized crime across borders in Europe.

title: Mannix
des: Mannix worked originally for Wickersham at Intertect and then struck out on his own, assisted by Peggy Fair (whose cop-husband had been killed) and Police Department contact Tobias.

title: I Am Wrath
des: A man is out for justice after a group of corrupt police officers are unable to catch his wife's killer.

title: Pretty Little Liars: The Perfectionists
des: Everything about the town of Beacon Heights seems perfect, but in the aftermath of the town's first murder, behind every Perfectionist hides secrets, lies and much needed alibies.

title: Harry Brown
des: An elderly ex-serviceman and widower looks to avenge his best friend's murder by doling out his own form of justice.

title: Horrible Bosses 2
des: Dale, Kurt and Nick decide to start their own business but things don't go as planned because of a slick investor, prompting the trio to pull off a harebrained and misguided kidnapping scheme.

title: The Transporter
des: Frank Martin, who "transports" packages for unknown clients, is asked to move a package that soon begins moving, and complications arise.

title: Mississippi Burning
des: Two F.B.I. Agents with wildly different styles arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

title: Marathon Man
des: A graduate history student is unwittingly caught in the middle of an international conspiracy involving stolen diamonds, an exiled Nazi war criminal, and a rogue government agent.

title: Nash Bridges
des: A smart alecky San Francisco, California cop and his get rich quick scheme of a partner keep tabs on crime and take down the bad guys in the Bay Area.

title: Sexy Beast
des: Brutal gangster Don Logan recruits "retired" safecracker Gal for one last job, but it goes badly for both of them.

title: The Saint
des: Simon Templar (Sir Roger Moore), a wealthy adventurer known as The Saint, travels around in his white Volvo P1800S.

title: Masterminds
des: A guard at an armored car company in the Southern U.S. organizes one of the biggest bank heists in American history. Based on the October 1997 Loomis Fargo robbery.

title: Heavenly Creatures
des: Two teenage girls share a unique bond; their parents, concerned that the friendship is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.

title: The Enforcer
des: San Francisco Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan (Clint Eastwood) must foil a terrorist organization made up of disgruntled Vietnam veterans. But this time, he's teamed with female partner Inspector Kate Moore (Tyne Daly), with whom he's not too excited to be working.

title: Nancy Drew and the Hidden Staircase
des: A bit of an outsider struggling to fit into her new surroundings, Nancy and her pals set out to solve a mystery, make new friends, and establish their place in the community.

title: Chungking Express
des: Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal server at a late-night restaurant he frequents.

title: Aquarius
des: A gritty 1960s cop drama about LAPD detective Sam Hodiak and his trainee, who must deal with gangs, brutal crimes, changing times, family crises and unhinged manipulative small-time crook Charles Manson, who's slowly building his cult.

title: American Dreamer
des: A down on his luck HAIL driver who makes extra cash chauffeuring a low level drug dealer around town, finds himself in a serious financial bind and decides to kidnap the dealer's child.

title: 21 Grams
des: A freak accident brings together a critically ill mathematician, a grieving mother, and a born-again ex-con.

title: Scott & Bailey
des: Two female detectives, one motherly, the other emotionally immature, have varying levels of success applying their eccentric outlooks on life to their police cases and private lives.

title: A Touch of Frost
des: DI Jack Frost is an unconventional policeman with sympathy for the underdog and an instinct for moral justice. Sloppy, disorganized and disrespectful, he attracts trouble like a magnet.

title: Bluebeards Ten Honeymoons
des: A golddigger inspires her older lover to murder wealthy women for the finances to keep her happy.

title: Cagney & Lacey
des: Two female police detectives cooperate with each other both in their professions and in their personal lives.

title: Less Than Zero
des: A college freshman returns to L.A. for the holidays at his ex-girlfriend's request, but discovers that his former best friend has an out-of-control drug habit.

title: Strange Days
des: A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a conspiracy in Los Angeles in 1999.

title: White Girl
des: Summer, New York City. A college girl falls hard for a guy she just met. After a night of partying goes wrong, she goes to wild extremes to get him back.

title: S.W.A.T.
des: An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody, and only the L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
des: A crime boss teams up with a cop to track down a serial killer.

title: Miss Congeniality
des: An F.B.I. Agent must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a group from bombing the event.

title: In the Heat of the Night
des: An African-American police detective is asked to investigate a murder in a racially hostile southern town.

title: Get a Clue
des: A wealthy student with too much fashion sense, her equally rich friends, and her rival/superior from the school paper work together to solve the case when their teacher goes missing.

title: Las Vegas
des: Welcome to the Montecito Resort and Casino in Las Vegas, where you can do anything you want, but Ed Deline and his crack surveillance team will be watching. Just remember: what happens in Vegas stays in Vegas.

title: Blood Father
des: An ex-con reunites with his estranged wayward 17-year old daughter to protect her from drug dealers who are trying to kill her.

title: Forever
des: A 200-year-old man works in the New York City Morgue trying to find a key to unlock the curse of his immortality.

title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
des: When a shopping mall is taken over by a gang of organized crooks, it's up to a mild-mannered security guard to save the day.

title: Hangman
des: A homicide detective brings his partner out of retirement to help catch a serial killer whose crimes are based on the children's game Hangman.

title: A Most Violent Year
des: In New York City 1981, an ambitious immigrant fights to protect his business and family during the most dangerous year in the city's history.

title: Finding Steve McQueen
des: In 1972, a gang of close-knit thieves from Youngstown, Ohio attempt to steal $30 million in illegal contributions and blackmail money from President Richard Nixon's secret fund.

title: Machete Kills
des: The U.S. government recruits Machete to battle his way through Mexico in order to take down an arms dealer who looks to launch a weapon into space.

title: The Death of Dick Long
des: Dick died last night, and Zeke and Earl don't want anybody finding out how. That's too bad though, cause news travels fast in small-town Alabama.

title: Crank
des: Professional assassin Chev Chelios learns his rival has injected him with a poison that will kill him if his heart rate drops.

title: Super Troopers
des: Five Vermont state troopers, avid pranksters with a knack for screwing up, try to save their jobs and out-do the local police department by solving a crime.

title: The Jackal
des: An imprisoned I.R.A. fighter is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly "faceless" assassin from completing his next job.

title: The Heat
des: An uptight FBI Special Agent is paired with a foul-mouthed Boston cop to take down a ruthless drug lord.

title: Red Dawn
des: A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.

title: J. Edgar
des: J. Edgar Hoover, powerful head of the F.B.I. for nearly fifty years, looks back on his professional and personal life.

title: London Kills
des: Drama series following the detectives of an elite murder investigation squad in London.

title: The Rover
des: 10 years after a global economic collapse, a hardened loner pursues the men who stole his only possession, his car. Along the way, he captures one of the thieves' brother, and the duo form an uneasy bond during the dangerous journey.

title: Loving Vincent
des: In a story depicted in oil painted animation, a young man comes to the last hometown of painter Vincent van Gogh to deliver the troubled artist's final letter and ends up investigating his final days there.

title: American Animals
des: Four young men mistake their lives for a movie and attempt one of the most audacious heists in U.S. history.

title: Rio
des: When Blu, a domesticated macaw from small-town Minnesota, meets the fiercely independent Jewel, he takes off on an adventure to Rio de Janeiro with the bird of his dreams.

title: Confessions of a Dangerous Mind
des: An adaptation of the cult memoir of game show impresario Chuck Barris, in which he purports to have been a CIA hitman.

title: The Call
des: When a veteran 911 operator takes a life-altering call from a teenage girl who has just been abducted, she realizes that she must confront a killer from her past in order to save the girl's life.

title: Loving Pablo
des: A journalist strikes up a romantic relationship with notorious drug lord Pablo Escobar.

title: Keanu
des: When the adorable kitten of an L.A. crime kingpin unexpectedly enters the life of two cousins, they will have to go through tough gangs, pitiless hit-men, and ruthless drug dealers who all claim him, to get him back. How hard can it be?

title: The Pink Panther
des: Bumbling Inspector Clouseau must solve the murder of a famous soccer coach and find out who stole the infamous Pink Panther diamond.

title: Cash Truck
des: The plot follows H, a cold and mysterious character working at a cash truck company responsible for moving hundreds of millions of dollars around Los Angeles each week.

title: The Ice Harvest
des: A shady lawyer attempts a Christmas Eve crime, hoping to swindle the local mob out of some money. But his partner, a strip club owner, might have different plans for the cash.

title: The Infiltrator
des: A U.S. Customs official uncovers a money laundering scheme involving Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar.

title: In the Fade
des: Katja's life collapses after the death of her husband and son in a bomb attack. After a time of mourning and injustice, Katja seeks revenge.

title: The Flash
des: A police forensic scientist, Barry Allen, battles crimes as the super-fast superhero "The Flash".

title: Get Smart
des: Maxwell Smart, a highly intellectual but bumbling spy working for the CONTROL agency, battles the evil forces of rival spy agency KAOS with the help of his competent partner Agent 99.

title: The Haves and the Have Nots
des: Centers on the rich Cryer and Harrington families (the haves) and the poor Young family (the have nots) whose lives intertwine when Hanna Young begins working for the Cryers.

title: The Hot Spot
des: Upon arriving to a small town, a drifter quickly gets into trouble with the local authorities- and the local women- after he robs a bank.

title: The Bletchley Circle: San Francisco
des: Two female British code breakers team with American cryptographers to solve a series of murders in San Francisco.

title: Killing Them Softly
des: Jackie Cogan is an enforcer hired to restore order after three dumb guys rob a Mob protected card game, causing the local criminal economy to collapse.

title: Infernal Affairs
des: A story between a mole in the police department and an undercover cop. Their objectives are the same: to find out who is the mole, and who is the cop.

title: Cosmopolis
des: Riding across Manhattan in a stretch limo in order to get a haircut, a 28-year-old billionaire asset manager's day devolves into an odyssey with a cast of characters that start to tear his world apart.

title: Rumble in the Bronx
des: A young man visiting and helping his uncle in New York City finds himself forced to fight a street gang and the mob with his martial art skills.

title: Revenge
des: A retired US Navy pilot comes to Mexico, where he falls in love with the wife of a powerful businessman. The consequences will be cruel and unforeseen.

title: 16 Blocks
des: An aging alcoholic cop is assigned the task of escorting a witness from police custody to a courthouse 16 blocks away. There are, however, chaotic forces at work that prevent them from making it in one piece.

title: Michael Clayton
des: A law firm brings in its "fixer" to remedy the situation after a lawyer has a breakdown while representing a chemical company that he knows is guilty in a multibillion-dollar class action suit.

title: The Pink Panther
des: The bumbling Inspector Clouseau travels to Rome to catch a notorious jewel thief known as "The Phantom" before he conducts his most daring heist yet: a princess' priceless diamond with one slight imperfection, known as "The Pink Panther".

title: Freedom Writers
des: A young teacher inspires her class of at-risk students to learn tolerance, apply themselves and pursue education beyond high school.

title: The Limehouse Golem
des: In Victorian London, a Scotland Yard inspector hunts down the sadistic killer behind a series of gory, Jack the Ripper-Like murders.

title: Rope
des: Two men attempt to prove they committed the perfect crime by hosting a dinner party after strangling their former classmate to death.

title: Marauders
des: When a bank is hit by a brutal heist, all evidence points to the owner and his high-powered clients. But as a group of FBI agents dig deeper into the case - and the deadly heists continue - it becomes clear that a larger conspiracy is at play.

title: The Informant!
des: The U.S. government decides to go after an agro-business giant with a price-fixing accusation, based on the evidence submitted by their star witness, vice president-turned-informant Mark Whitacre.

title: Muppets Most Wanted
des: While on a grand world tour, The Muppets find themselves wrapped into an European jewel-heist caper headed by a Kermit the Frog look-alike and his dastardly sidekick.

title: Miami Vice
des: Based on the 1980s TV action/drama, this update focuses on vice detectives Crockett and Tubbs as their respective personal and professional lives become dangerously intertwined.

title: The French Connection
des: A pair of NYC cops in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a drug smuggling job with a French connection.

title: Dead Man Down
des: In New York City, a crime lord's right-hand man is helped by a woman seeking retribution.

title: Spy Game
des: Retiring CIA agent Nathan Muir recalls his training of Tom Bishop while working against agency politics to free him from his Chinese captors.

title: Absolute Power
des: Career thief Luther Whitney (Clint Eastwood) witnesses a horrific crime involving U.S. President Alan Richmond (Gene Hackman).

title: I Love You Phillip Morris
des: A cop turns con man once he comes out of the closet. Once imprisoned, he meets the second love of his life, whom he'll stop at nothing to be with.

title: Message Man
des: A retired assassin's past catches up with him and his brutality surfaces as he goes on a final killing spree to make things right.

title: Taggart
des: The Maryhill CID investigates gruesome murders against the bleak backdrop of the city of Glasgow.

title: Lethal Weapon 2
des: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

title: RoboCop 3
des: Robocop saves the day once more. This time the half man/half robot takes on ruthless developers who want to evict some people on "their" land.

title: No Offence
des: Follows a group of police officers on the front line wondering what they did to end up where they are now, on the ugly side of Manchester.

title: Crooked House
des: In Agatha Christie's most twisted tale, a spy-turned-private-detective is lured by his former lover to catch her grandfather's murderer before Scotland Yard exposes dark family secrets.

title: The Young Offenders
des: Two teenage boys cycle 160km on stolen bikes pursued by police to find a missing bale of cocaine worth 7 million euro. Set around the real event of Ireland's biggest cocaine seizure in 2007 of 440 million euro.

title: SuperFly
des: With retirement on his mind, a successful young drug dealer sets up one last big job, while dealing with trigger-happy colleagues and the police.

title: Harsh Times
des: A tough-minded drama about two friends in South Central Los Angeles and the violence that comes between them.

title: Perfect Stranger
des: A journalist goes undercover to ferret out businessman Harrison Hill as her childhood friend's killer. Posing as one of his temps, she enters into a game of online cat-and-mouse.

title: The House
des: After the town takes away their daughter's college scholarship, a couple start an illegal casino in their friend's house to make back the money.

title: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
des: Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.

title: Silverado
des: A misfit bunch of friends come together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

title: Miller's Crossing
des: Tom Regan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.

title: In Plain Sight
des: U.S. Marshall Mary Shannon must hunt down witnesses for federal cases in the witness protection program while also managing rather dysfunctional family and her own personal life.

title: Baby's Day Out
des: After three kidnappers lose the baby they have kidnapped, both the cops and kidnappers go looking for the baby.

title: Wild Wild Country
des: When the world's most controversial guru builds an utopian city deep in the Oregon country, conflict with the locals escalates into a national scandal. A true story.

title: Arsenic and Old Lace
des: A drama critic learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are homicidal maniacs, and that insanity runs in his family.

title: Ready for War
des: Andrew Renzi's sheds light on the lives of three of the estimated thousands of immigrants who volunteer for service in the American military, yet find themselves deported from the US once their tours of duty are over.

title: Liar
des: British psychological thriller in which schoolteacher Laura Nielson accuses renowned surgeon Andrew Earlham of rape.

title: xXx: State of the Union
des: Darius Stone, a new agent in the xXx program, is sent to Washington, D.C. to stop a coup attempt against the President of the United States.

title: Tower Heist
des: When a group of hard-working guys find out they've fallen victim to their wealthy employer's Ponzi scheme, they conspire to rob his high-rise residence.

title: Backdraft
des: Two Chicago firefighter brothers, who don't get along, have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.

title: Trinkets

title: Love and a .45

title: Bully
des: A pack of naïve teenagers conspire to murder a mutual friend, whose aggressive demeanor has proved too much.

title: A Most Wanted Man

title: Awake
des: A man wakes in a hospital bed with no recollection of who he is, and learns that he's wanted by the police for a committing a series of murders.

title: The Five

title: Rookie Blue

title: Runaway Jury

title: Psycho II

title: Imperium

title: Damages

title: The ABC Murders

title: Badlands

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

title: Taking Lives

title: Straw Dogs

title: Near Dark

As the two men get to know each other, he becomes more and more suspicious of the man who is always there with a helpful hand.

title: Baby Boy
des: This is the story of Jody, an unemployed young black man, who's been living with his mother for several years, even though he's got a child of his own. Romantically, he's having ...                See full summary »

des: A crime drama featuring main character Cat Chambers, a thief-turned-fixer for the governor of a stunning and seductive Pacific Island paradise. Impulsive, reckless and irresistible, Cat's ...                See full summary »

title: The Lost Capone
des: Fictionalized account of Jimmy Capone (Pasdar), the brother of gangster Al Capone (Roberts) who assumed an alias and became a lawman.

des: Based on the actual life and events of American serial killer, rapist and cannibal Albert Fish, an mistreated orphan which himself became a self punishing beast later in life.

des: It's a dirty and profitable life of crime for the car thieves known as "choppers." It takes speed, nerve, and know-how, but add murder and an undercover cop into the mix and it can get pretty explosive.

des: Four friends plan the perfect small town bank heist, but choose the wrong night. Their plans go horribly wrong when vampiric zombies attack the town and trap them in the bank. Can they escape with the money and their lives?
